div.p: Sketch of the linear combination in the Variational Method for the heptamer on a gold surface. The black lines symbolize modes of three different systems (from left to right): heptamer cluster, heptamer cluster on the surface, and the surface with plasmon energy ω p = 8.87 eV. The green region illustrates the position of bright mode ω < ω 0 with ω 0 = 2.38 eV.
